sections.title: Graphical User Interface
sections.content: The GUI is not currently fully fleshed out. The controls are set.

sections.title: Console
sections.content:
Main Article: Console
The console menu is shown with the 'F1' key.

sections.title: Settings
sections.content:
In game settings can be adjusted by pressing the 'F2' key.
